text:
Nuzzel - Lead Android engineer (San Francisco)

Be Employee #5 -- Nuzzel is backed up by A16Z, SoftTech, Homebrew, Max Levchin, Naval Ravikant, Chris Sacca, and others.

Nuzzel is a new social news app that people love. Our iPhone app is featured by Apple and has a 5-star average rating. Come build our Android app! People are asking for it on Twitter every day..

Email the adresss in our HTML source.

http://nuzzel.com/
